items.sentence: The amount of time Tom estimated that it\'ll take seems reasonable.
The doctor told Tom he\'d just have to learn to live with the pain.
Tom\'s grandparents are buried in a cemetery not too far from here.
Tom informed Mary that she was going to have to do that by herself.
Tom is having a very hard time trying to figure out how to do that.
Tom keeps a pair of binoculars in the glove compartment of his car.
Tom knows better than to do something like that without permission.
Is it true there are more male bus drivers than female bus drivers?
Tom closed the venetian blinds, so the neighbors couldn\'t look in.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was going to be at the party last night.
